_sText:
About Map
==================
This is dodgeball map, where you need to balance on 2 platforms. You can jump on the second one to kill your enemies, or disrupt their platform balance.
Static Version
==================
If you don't like balance, but you still want have this map on server, you can make platforms static. Read "How to make static.txt" which is in db_balance.zip file, for more instructions.
Inspiration
==================
I was inspirated by [mg_balance](http://www.gamebanana.com/maps/73158 "mg_balance") map made by solid_snake.
Credits
==================
##### In this map i used:
- [Down-Under](http://www.gamebanana.com/textures/16 "Down-Under") Skybox texture made by Mighty Pete.
- [Neon Textures](http://www.gamebanana.com/textures/1315 "Neon Textures") made by shoxyyy.
- [Awesome Letterpack](http://www.gamebanana.com/prefabs/2338 "Awesome Letterpack") prefab, made by Black.
